body:
While a previous comic i saw had the problem of being too dark and realistic,this next one has the complete opposite! I'm gonna go blind just staring at this shit,where is all that sunlight coming from? And it's too cartoonish! Those eyes are bigger than my erect penis. And they all look the same with the exception of eye colour changing somewhat between a few characters. And the tits look like they are made of stone for crying out loud! They look so round and not affected by gravity. A mistake lots of people make but a mistake non the less. I don't wanna see women who can knock me out by hitting me with their tits,artist-chan!
There's also the issue of this being cencored. I know this is law in japan,but great hentai strips require great sacrifice! 
 I expect improvement from you.
Love it, we need more like this
